Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run bomb to ignite the home crowd
Starling Marte doubled home Alondo and Jesse Winker
Francisco Lindor hit an RBI triple and Nimmo hit an RBI single
Winker got plunked to leadoff the bottom of the sixth and advanced to third on a Marte double
Edwin Díaz pitched a shutdown eighth and ninth to seal victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets live to fight another day
The Mets’ bats broke out in the final game at Citi Field to send the NLCS back to Chavez Ravine
The Dodgers were outscored, 18-2, in the first two games in Flushing Meadows
Others: David Peterson dodged a bullet in the top of the first
Shohei Ohtani and Mookie Betts opened the game with a single and double, respectively
